root.name: Wanderlust: Rebirth
root.description: OverviewThe heroes are summoned to Westhaven Arena to prove their worth as heroes of old legend. However, things are not as transparent as they first appear, when our heroes are unknowingly set upon a trek to save mankind from an ominous end. Band together with your fellow brethren to conquer and change the course of destiny.Classic JRPG stuff where you take control of a party to beat the hell out of minions of the evil worlds that invaded your world. You can unlock several game-modes like survival and Luck-box, a slot machine inspired mini-game.The game supports co-op play with up to 4 players.
